DOC.brief_summary: A randomized double blind control trial conduct evaluate effect daily supplementation soy isoflavone 100 mg/day 12 month 182 postmenopausal woman age 47 60 year subdistrict South Jakarta Indonesia . The study hypothesis supplementation soy isoflavone 100 mg/day 6 12 month increase endothelial function .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Soy Isoflavone Supplementation Endothelial Function
DOC.detailed_description: The subject randomize intervention group receive tablet consist 100 mg soy isoflavone calcium carbonate 500 mg control group receive 500 mg calcium carbonate 1 year . This study carry 13 month ( 13 x 28 day ) . There three outcome measure study ; vascular cell adhesion molecule- ( VCAM-1 ) , nitric oxide ( NO ) malonyldialdehyde ( MDA ) . The outcome measure assess three time ; soy isoflavone supplementation / begin study , post supplementation 6 month 12 month . The outcome measure change baseline level VCAM-1 , NO MDA .
DOC.criteria: healthy postmenopausal woman natural cessation 110 year body mass index < =35 kg/m2 receive medication supplement previous 6 month chronic terminal disease severe psychosis
